title: Veteran investor Jeremy Grantham says AI is 'obviously a bubble' — and it could tank the stock market when it bursts
full_text: Veteran investor Jeremy Grantham says AI is 'obviously a bubble' — and it could tank the stock market when it bursts. Veteran investor Jeremy Grantham compared the AI boom to the railroad and internet bubbles, and said the chances it won't burst are "slim to none.".
